name: Re-Génèse
description:
IMPORTANT

The game is in French only.

Presentation

Made in May 2019 for the Pot-Au Jeu 2.0.

It was my fifth game jam.

The theme was "Metamorphosis".

Tools

Gamemaker Studio: 2, Aseprite, Bosca Ceoil, Bfxr, Beesbusy.

Credits

Fonts Grand9K Pixel and Pixel Millennium.

Gameplay

The game is in French only.

The controls are shown in-game.

Tips (spoiler)

Finishing the game reveals you a secret recipe.
